title: Is making a model of Teeth with wax changing the creation of Allah molds
transcript: baruch from sweden if i understood his question correctly he's asking about making a model of wax to the lower joe and the upper jaw because he's a medical uh a student and he's becoming or learning to be a dentist so he's asking about am i imitating the creation of allah the answer is what you're doing by modeling in wax the upper jaw and the lower jaw or the structure of the whole jaw even if you do that half of the head this is all legitimate inshallah and there's no problem in doing that at all you
